ealth Screen Screen in each trimester 
HIV counselling and testing  Retest monthly if HIV negative 
ART for HIV-infected women Viral load monitoring as per guidelines 
Tdap given   Give a single dose of Tdap at 
any one of these visits    
Iron and folate supplementation provided         
Calcium supplementation provided         
Information for emergencies given         
Antenatal record completed and given to woman         
Prepare person for what to bring for labour and
